itemInfo.itemDesc:
A white sauce used for Cooking.

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Usage: Stir-Fried Seafood

item.name: Base Sauce
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Base Sauce
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Apple
item.desc: A tasty apple used as an ingredient in Cooking.\nUsage: Fruit Juice, Fruit Pudding, etc.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered from Apple Trees using Bare Hands or purchased from a special Merchant.

item.name: Milk
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be received from a farm Quest. It can be Processed into other Cooking ingredients.\n\n- Usage: Cream, Cheese, Fruit Pudding, etc.

item.name: Cooking Wine
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.
